articles.content: Have you ever wanted to buy Marvel, Star Wars, and Disney collectibles, toys, and games in India? Short of third party retailers, we pretty much have had no options so far. However, Disney has now fi… [+1406 chars]

articles.title: Micromax In Note 1 To Go on Sale via Flipkart Tomorrow: Prices, Specifications and Offers - News18
articles.description: The Micromax In Note 1 has been priced at Rs 10,999 onwards for the base 4GB RAM + 64GB storage variant, while the 128GB storage variant has been priced at Rs 12,499.
articles.content: After much hype, Micromax finally established its return to the Indian smartphone market with the launch of the new Micromax In series including the Micromax In Note 1 and the Micromax In 1B. Both th… [+2186 chars]
